::Grimlock/Elder::

Grimlock, while in T-Rex mode smacks one of his fists into the palm of his other hand.

Grimlock: Me Grimlock want to munch metal!

Elder looked down in thought. Jotunn was leading the group in a very aggressive Predacon way. Elder is a Maximal at heart and this bothers him. However he knows that to fight what they are faced with it may be the only way.

Elder looks up at Jotunn.

Elder: No prisoners on this day. It is important to protect Rodimus Prime. I have a feeling that the Minions are actually after just one thing: The Matrix...

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Jotunn: Right. All hands to their station. We launch in 3, 2, 1, Lift off!
 
 The transports shuddered as they left the dock but, as they cleared,
 gained more and more speed until they were over the land and bound for
 Atlantis.
 
 Jotunn: This will take some time. I want a team of fliers standing by.
  You'll be the spearhead. We can't use the autoguns before we have
 clear enemy IDs. Your job will be to throw the minions in disarray and
 to paint them for artillery to take them down. We want to avoid
 friendly fire at all cost. Once the most of them are gone, ground team
 takes over. I want you to pack as much a punch as possible We shoot
 for the kill against them, because if they retreat, they'll come back
 even worse after that. Understood?
 
 The crew signified its approval. Jotunn then looked over to Grimlock
 and Elder.
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > OOC: I could probably help with Grimlock starting now.
 > 
 > ::Lord Elder/Grimlock::
 > 
 > The Watcher leader and revived Dinobot head to the transports with
 Jotunn and take their places.
 > 
 > Elder: Let's not waste much time. Those Maximals are getting
 slaughtered.
 > 
 > Grimlock: Me Grimlock seen this before. Fight big! Autobot City...
 > 
 > Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               OOC: I
 spoke with Kham on the phone yesterday. Could somebody help me
 >  with Grimlock? I'll take care of Remus and let Razorwing sleep until
 >  he gets back.
 >  
 >  BIC:
 >  
 >  Jotunn: Thank you. My lord Elder, Grimlock, if you'd follow me
 please...
 >  
 >  He ran to the ships where the troops where almost done with
 preparations.
 >  
 >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <khamkain@> wrote:
 >  >
 >  > ooc: Still in school rushed so I won't be able to post a lot for
 about
 >  > two or three week so i'll let Nic take control of Remus,
 Razorwing and
 >  > Grimlock until everything cooled down a bit.
 >  > 
 >  > bic: Razorwing : Since the city is still in bad shape I can only let
 >  > you off with about 30 men and three airtransport loaded with autogun.
 >  > You're going to have two airfigther to cover you. That's pretty much
 >  > what I can do right now but keep in contact radioand I migth be able
 >  > to get you some reinforcement.
 >  > 
 >  > 
 >  > 
 >  > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  > >
 >  > > ::Lord Elder::
 >  > > 
 >  > > Elder: I don't have that ability either. I hope Relay can spare a
 >  > transport.
 >  > > 
 >  > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                               Deadfur:
 >  > Roger that, sir.
 >  > >  
 >  > >  Deadfur starts sending signals to Atlantis asking to send a
 situation
 >  > >  report and telling them that reinforcements are en route.
 >  > >  
 >  > >  Jotunn: There is just one problem, Elder: I can't fly.
 >  > >  
 >  > >  > ::Lord Elder::
 >  > >  > 
 >  > >  > Elder: Deadfur, try and hail Atlantis. I want to know how
 bad they
 >  > >  are hurt. We'll need to assemble a group to got help them. I'll go
 >  > >  with them. If you can get in contact with anyone at Atlantis,
 I want
 >  > >  to know the status of Rodimus Prime. He is the best hope against
 >  > >  Unicron's forces.
 >  > >  > 
 >  > >  > Elder redirects his attention.
 >  > >  > 
 >  > >  > Elder: Razorwing, how many can we afford to send to
 Atlantis? I'll
 >  > >  go with Jotunn and Grimlock.
 >  > >  
 >  > >
